name: enhance_image
description: Enhance image with brightness, contrast, saturation, and sharpness adjustments. Supports fine-tuning image appearance for better visual quality.

image_path.description: Path to the input image file

brightness.description: Brightness adjustment factor (0.0-3.0). 1.0 means no change

contrast.description: Contrast adjustment factor (0.0-3.0). 1.0 means no change

saturation.description: Saturation adjustment factor (0.0-3.0). 1.0 means no change

sharpness.description: Sharpness adjustment factor (0.0-3.0). 1.0 means no change

output_path.description: Path for the output image. If not provided, will create enhanced version with suffix
